doc.previous: According to proponents Appropriate Technologies can greatly reduce the labor required to prepare food compared to traditional methods while being much simpler and cheaper than the processing used in Western countries This reflects E F Schumacher s concept of intermediate technology i e technology which is significantly more effective and expensive than traditional methods but still an order of magnitude 10 times cheaper than developed world technology Key examples are
